Text: I hear that Paul Wiggle is sick with mystery illness, and no longer touring with the band...

Nope, that'd be Greg, the Yellow Wiggle :)

http://www.theage.com.au/articles/2006/11/29/1164476260920.html
No, he has an inner ear problem that prevents him from jumping around and dancing which is necessary for his role in the Wiggles. So, he had to quit.
